mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.activity_type AS "activityType", a.name AS "name", a.active_date AS "activeDate", a.inactive_date AS "inactiveDate", a.order_active_date AS "orderActiveDate", a.order_inactive_date AS "orderInactiveDate", a.url AS "url", a.is_follow AS "isFollow", a.rebate_type AS "rebateType", a.rebate_channel AS "rebateChannel", a.per_amount AS "perAmount", a.max_order_limit AS "maxOrderLimit", a.total_amount AS "totalAmount", a.is_audit AS "isAudit", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.shop_no AS "shopNo", a.template_link AS "templateLink", a.status AS "status", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_activity( activity_type, name, active_date, inactive_date, order_active_date, order_inactive_date, url, is_follow, rebate_type, rebate_channel, per_amount, max_order_limit, total_amount, is_audit, shop_name, shop_no, template_link, status, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{activityType}, #{name}, #{activeDate}, #{inactiveDate}, #{orderActiveDate}, #{orderInactiveDate}, #{url}, #{isFollow}, #{rebateType}, #{rebateChannel}, #{perAmount}, #{maxOrderLimit}, #{totalAmount}, #{isAudit}, #{shopName}, #{shopNo}, #{templateLink}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, now(), #{updateBy.id}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_activity SET status = #{status}, update_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
